name: Jack's Beanstalk
description:
In a far a away place, where reality checks it's coat at the door; there exists fairy tales. Join us in a twisted fairy tale where the Jack (a pig) has grown a magical beanstalk.

Join us in a world where pigs are the heroes, help Jack collect the gold and chop down the endless beanstalk, all the while avoiding the branches. Collect coins to help you along your journey, How far can you make it, in this addictively challenging pig vine chopping game!

Jack's Beanstalk

Key features:
• Endless action
• Vivid cartoon look and feel
• Adorable pig that is the hero of the game!
• Easy to play, hard to play awesome
• Constant free updates with new game play innovations
